events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway during rush hour, requesting to file a claim.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the keywords relating to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim promptly and efficiently.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and informed about the next steps in the process.
The agent requested submission of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the insurance policy.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the damage and the official police report.
The claims department began investigating the accident circumstances and verifying all submitted documentation.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and validating the customer’s claim details and vehicle damage.
A fair settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer for review regarding vehicle repairs costs coverage.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the swift handling of the case.
The claim was officially approved after the customer's acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount was issued and processed to the customer’s account.
The claim was formally closed after payment confirmation and final follow-up with the customer.
All claim documents and related data were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
